name: Brunstons
text:
Brunstons
The Brunstons were a couple looking to adopt a boy named Donnie from the Dorritt Home For Boys.
In March 1989, the Brunstons came to visit Donnie on more than one occasion. During one of these instances, they encountered Dick Tremayne and Andy Brennan, believing them to be employees of the boys' home. When they inquired about Donnie, Dick insisted that Donnie was not feeling well, despite being in perfect health the day before.
